title: League Of Legends Winter Map and Limited edition runes.
body: I was just wondering if we can ever look forward to fun stuff like this again? I miss the things that made league special. . It stuck out from other games that were similar and the holiday's felt inviting on the game! I miss the winter map, and I miss the limited edition Runes that you could purchase as well. . You also did little things like turn the health potions and such into cups of hot cocoa or candy. League has grown and as a person that has been here since the start I can honestly say it's become a little disheartening to see the holidays that were once cherished just thrown away. . It's halloween and the halloween skins aren't even out. .The little events we were able to do for special rewards and Icons are far less with holidays..and both the winter map and halloween map are vanished forever so it seems. These little things are what kept me the loyal customer I am with league of legends.. I literally cannot be gifted because I own almost every skin ever made (not kidding here..Just missing the pax skins really). . and I gift my friends often.  I am one of the people that helped put you where you were and believed in you.. and that's not me having a big head, that's me being honest. . I own over 600 Skins. . Do the math? that's ALOT of money. . thousands of dollars. .  I didn't mind paying for the skins or spending the money for the time it took to make such awesome stuff. .But I just want to ask a simple favor. . Please do something for me for a change.. for the community... For the people that have been here and the new people that never got to see it..Please bring us back our winter map this year? I have patiently waited to see the game I fell in love with come back to me.. Those little things, the special things that you looked forward to every year. . are just gone. collecting the runes was awesome. . It gave me something to do by saving up my IP and patiently waiting. Seems now though. . that things like that. . the ones that make no real profit are just not here anymore. I just have to ask, were those thing genuine??? OR were they to build the game into what it is now??? You have your money... can we please have our fun? You're still going to get your money off the skins you release, and several other things you make profit from.  As a loyal customer (and I am sure I speak for many) can we please please please have some of these special little moments from the past back? I hope you take the time to read this riot. Thank you for many years of fun..here's to hoping for many more.. Please prove that my money and my time have been spent well. . show us you care about us by treating us to the things that used to make league what it was..  The special maps. . The special runes. . The tiny little things  that made you say " oh hey that's pretty darn cool. . my health pot is a cocoa cup!" OR " oh sweet I get to collect these limited edition runes that have pumpkins and snowmen". . The new people to this game have never got to see these thing and think I am crazy when I say they were a thing.  Please try and remember who you were before you got so big. . You were loyal to those that were loyal to you.  -awesome winter map-http://www.gamingnexus.com/Images/News/nwuzjn15448/3.jpg  AND http://www.onrpgblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/HolidayRunes.jpg <--- Link to the runes.  -sigh-

replies.body: I for one would love to spend the holidays with my friends on League! How much work rito does for the gangplank event never to be seen again. The harrowing seems like it was cancelled this year for SKT. It'd be amazing if we could play customs together with fun maps and announcers.

Yes! I wish they could even just put the maps back under the custom games at this point..yes they are old..yes they are outdated. . but man they were special!! It's good to look back on those things and remember how sweet the game was and how excited I got when I knew it was christmas time!
Unfortunately they changed the hitboxes of walls on SR when they updated it so I don't think they will do that without changing it a little bit.

The Halloween event wasn't cancelled, just delayed, I'm pretty sure.
Meanwhile, we got a 4-chapters worth of a Harrowing story, since Riot separated the actual_ Halloween_ from the _Harrowing_.

Well it's fine if they want to separate the two...but then I feel they should still do something for Halloween.  If they want to do harrowing all year I'm fine with that, just make sure to **also** do it on Halloween.

I really like this! The small changes to the map, runes etc. make the game feel more alive and more interesting :) Here are some suggestions:
--------
**Christmas Content:**

- Winter version of Summoner's Rift
- Snowmen, red candles and decoration on the trees, frozen river
- The animals on the map change fur or feather colour etc., or even get scarfs and hats
- Baron gets santa hats for all the heads!
- Rift Herald gets an elf hat, as he is Santa Baron's little helper
- Dragon gets a knit cardigan (he is not pleased with this gift from his grandma, but wears it out of respect for her...)
- Jungle creeps get antlers and red noses
- Winter themed runes
- Special Summoner Icons that can be purchased for IP or RP
--------
**Halloween Content:**

- Halloween version of Summoner's Rift
- Pumpkins with light, white and messy candles, grave stones, green river
- The animals on the map are switched out for bats, spiders and snakes instead
- Baron gets multiple pumpkin heads!
- Rift Herald gets a  Baron mask
- Dragon is now black with red eyes
- Jungle creeps are now ghosts
- Halloween themed runes
- Special Summoner Icons that can be purchased for IP or RP
--------
**Easter Content:**

- Easter version of Summoner's Rift
- Painted eggs, yellow candles, clearer river
- The animals on the map are switched out for chickens and bunnies instead
- Baron gets bunny ears for all heads!
- Rift Herald gets a basket full of eggs (he has collected them from Bunny Baron! :O)
- Dragon is now yellow with a chicken beak
- Jungle creeps get egg shells on top of their heads
- Easter themed runes
- Special Summoner Icons that can be purchased for IP or RP
--------
